description: Question ID to dimension/sub-indicator mapping for BizHealth questionnaire

questions.prompt_text: On a scale of 1-5, how well does your company understand your 'competitive differentiators'?
What share of your local market do you think you currently have?
What percent has your sales grown in the past year?
What is your target Sales growth for the upcoming year?
On a scale of 1-5, do you have a set plan or documented business goals for the next year?
On a scale of 1-5, do you review your business plan or adapt your business strategy every few months?
On a scale of 1-5, do you have a defined/documented plan for growing or someday selling your business?
Sales mix: B2B/B2C and Wholesale/Retail/Online
On a scale of 1-5, do your monthly sales targets align with what the business really needs?
Sales Pipeline Management: On a scale of 1-5, is your sales process smooth and organized?
Average Sales Cycle: how many days does it typically take to close a sale?
Close Rate: What percentage of your customer interactions result in a sale?
What is your average sale/order size (in dollars)?
Repeat Sales: What percentage of your monthly sales are from returning customers?
On a scale of 1-5, how actively do you focus on increasing sales to existing customers?
On a scale of 1-5, how well do your customers know your brand?
How many marketing methods/channels do you currently use?
What marketing channels are you currently using?
What marketing channels do you plan to use in the future?
On a scale of 1-5, do you know who your target customer is?
What is your Customer Acquisition Cost (CAC)?
What is your Customer Lifetime Value (LTV)?
What is your conversion rate from awareness to purchase?
What is your Marketing ROI?
On a scale of 1-5, how well do you track customer feedback?
On a scale of 1-5, how satisfied are your customers?
On a scale of 1-5, how likely are your customers to recommend you? (Net Promoter Score)
On a scale of 1-5, how easy is it for customers to do business with you? (Customer Effort Score)
On a scale of 1-5, how do you compare to your competitors in customer experience?
On a scale of 1-5, how effectively do you resolve customer issues on first contact?
What is your average response time to customer inquiries (in hours)?
On a scale of 1-5, how efficient are your operations?
On a scale of 1-5, how well documented are your workflows and processes?
What is your inventory turnover rate (times per year)?
On a scale of 1-5, how reliable are your operations?
On a scale of 1-5, how well do you apply lean principles?
What is your utilization rate for space, equipment, and personnel?
What is your total debt and liabilities?
What is your total working capital?
On a scale of 1-5, how well do you monitor your debt?
How much cash do you currently have available?
What are your near-term monthly expenses?
How many months of cash runway do you have?
What is your gross profit margin?
What is your estimated monthly profit?
What is your monthly burn rate?
On a scale of 1-5, how effective is your cash flow forecasting?
On a scale of 1-5, how effective is your budgeting and financial planning?
On a scale of 1-5, how financially ready are you for growth?
On a scale of 1-5, how complete is your HR infrastructure?
On a scale of 1-5, how strong is your company culture?
On a scale of 1-5, how effective is your recruiting and onboarding?
On a scale of 1-5, how effective is your training and development?
What is your employee turnover rate?
On a scale of 1-5, how engaged are your employees?
On a scale of 1-5, how effective is your performance management?
On a scale of 1-5, how effective is your leadership?
On a scale of 1-5, how clear is your decision-making structure?
On a scale of 1-5, how effective is your leadership/board oversight?
Do you have an advisory board?
On a scale of 1-5, how effective is your decision-making?
On a scale of 1-5, how effective is your leadership in creating culture?
On a scale of 1-5, how effective is your leadership development and mentorship?
How much do you invest annually in technology?
What percentage of your revenue comes from innovation pipeline?
On a scale of 1-5, how strong is your innovation culture?
On a scale of 1-5, how well do you track emerging technologies?
On a scale of 1-5, how quickly do you adopt new technologies?
On a scale of 1-5, how well do you utilize automation?
On a scale of 1-5, what is the impact of innovation on your business?
On a scale of 1-5, how adequate is your IT infrastructure?
On a scale of 1-5, how effective is your network?
On a scale of 1-5, how strong is your cybersecurity?
On a scale of 1-5, how effective is your data management?
On a scale of 1-5, how effective is your data governance?
On a scale of 1-5, how scalable is your IT infrastructure?
On a scale of 1-5, how effective is your IT support and maintenance?
On a scale of 1-5, what is your overall risk outlook?
On a scale of 1-5, how effectively do you identify and review risks?
On a scale of 1-5, how effective is your risk mitigation?
On a scale of 1-5, how prepared are your contingency plans?
On a scale of 1-5, how resilient are you financially?
On a scale of 1-5, how prepared are you for operational disruptions?
On a scale of 1-5, how stable is your succession and leadership?
On a scale of 1-5, how adaptable is your strategy?
On a scale of 1-5, how aware are you of compliance requirements?
On a scale of 1-5, how well do you adhere to policies?
On a scale of 1-5, how complete is your compliance training?
On a scale of 1-5, how effective is your compliance monitoring?
On a scale of 1-5, how well do you track regulatory updates?
On a scale of 1-5, how complete is your compliance documentation?
On a scale of 1-5, how effective is your incident reporting?
What are your annual compliance costs?

growth_gap.description: Difference between target and actual sales growth

sales_velocity.description: Revenue generated per day in sales cycle

cac_ltv_ratio.description: Ratio of customer lifetime value to acquisition cost

cash_ratio.description: Ratio of cash to near-term expenses

debt_to_asset_ratio.description: Ratio of debt to working capital

capacity_utilization_avg.description: Average utilization across space, equipment, and personnel
